MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the CH5 postcode area of Connahs Quay, affecting properties in Glynne Street, Mold Road and surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers are on site and in order to make a repair due to damaged electrical equipment at Glynne Street substation, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.45AM on 14th December 2020.
